title: The True Meaning of Luxury and Convenoence.
posting_body: ['Welcome to gracious living in the grand European tradition in the heart of upbeat, downtown Los Angeles, offering skyline views of one of Americas most dynamic cities.', 'Eleven distinctive floor plans that were creatively designed and crafted with a wealth of detail giving you the perfect setting for your luxurious California lifestyle.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Clear Glass Shower Enclosures', "-Three Cybex Elliptical Machines with Individual Flat-Screen TV's", '-Crown Moldings', '-24-Hour Doorman', '-Floor-to-Ceiling Mirrors', "-Four Cybex Cycling Machines with Individual Flat-Screen TV's", '-Beautiful Panoramic City Views from Many Vantage Points', '-Pilates Equipment', '-Cybex Strength Training Weight Machines', '-Large Picture Windows', '-Outdoor', 'Shower to Rinse Off', '-Private Balconies or Patios', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '1221 W. 3rd St., Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
